title: Character AI — AI Tool Review
description: Character AI lets you chat with AI versions of celebrities, fictional characters, and custom personas — creating immersive conversational experiences. Character AI is a platform for creating and chatting with AI characters — from real celebrities to fictional characters to custom personas. It's hugely popular with younger audiences for entertainment, roleplay, and companionship. Users can create their own AI characters with defined personalities. Character AI has over 20 million daily active users. Highlights: Vast library of pre-made characters. Custom character creation. Immersive roleplay experiences. Free to use. Strong community.
